Class DVD

  • java.lang.Object
    • DVD

  • public class DVD
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to store details about a DVD and display them.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • DVD

        public DVD()
        Constructor method for DVD class. Objects created in this way should use setters to set field values.

      • DVD

        public DVD(java.lang.String title,
           java.lang.String director,
           int runTime,
           float cost)
        Second constructor method for DVD class. This one takes four args - one for each field.
        Parameters:
        title - String for the title of the film.
        director - String for the director of the film.
        runTime - int for film runtime (minutes).
        cost - float for the cost of the film (pounds).
